duties_responsibilities.duty: Submits claims and follows-up on unpaid balances (insurance or patient), corrects errors, enters claim information, submits authorization/precertification requests with insurance companies, and follows up on denied claims and/or authorizations.
Performs billing tasks assigned by management including data entry, claim review, charge review, accounts receivable follow-up, and other related responsibilities.
Identifies payer, provider credentialing, and/or coding issues and addresses them with management.
Reviews reports to identify revenue opportunities and unpaid claims.
Appeals complex denials through review of payer policies, coding, contracts, and medical records.
Makes appropriate corrections to system to satisfy/edit payer requirements and re-submit claims as needed.
Cross covers other areas in the office as assigned by management including Accounts Receivable/Denials, Customer Service or Authorizations.
